title: Minor route path changes to bus routes 706, 857, 858 and 902
articleContent:
Minor route path changes to bus routes 706, 857, 858 and 902

From 24 April 2022, as part of the Level Crossing Removal Project, the Chelsea bus interchange will relocate south on Station Street.   

Due to the new location of the Chelsea bus interchange, minor route path changes will be made to bus routes 706 Mordialloc to Chelsea, 857 Chelsea to Dandenong, 858 Edithvale to Aspendale and 902 Chelsea to Airport West.

Service frequency, service operating hours, bus coordination with school bell times and connecting train services will remain unchanged for all four bus routes.

To plan your journey, view the timetables for routes 706, 857, 902 and 858, visit Journey planner or call 1800 800 007 to order a printed copy of your timetable.
articleDescription: From Sunday 24 April 2022, as part of the Level Crossing Removal Project, the Chelsea bus interchange will relocate 270 metres south on Station Street.
